name: Cosmic Symphony
condition_immunities: deafened, exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, stunned
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Can use Universal Music then one Discordant Wave and one Slam or two Discordant Waves.

actions.name: Discordant Wave
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +10 to hit 5 ft. or range 60/120' one target 27 (5d8+5) thunder. Target and each creature within 10 ft. of it: DC 18 Con save or become deafened until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, 5 ft., one target, 24 (3d10+8) bludgeoning damage + 22 (5d8) thunder.

actions.name: Universal Music
actions.desc: Each creature of symphony's choice within 120' of it: DC 18 Con save or be incapacitated 1 min. Creature that fails save by 5+ is stunned 1 min instead. Stunned or incapacitated creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself. If creature's save is successful or effect ends creature is immune to symphony's Universal Music for next 24 hrs.

actions.name: Celestial Crescendo (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Sound waves explode from it. Each creature within 30' of it: 45 (10d8) thunder and is deafened for 1 min (DC 18  Con half damage not deafened). A creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

legendary_actions.name: Fly
legendary_actions.desc: Flies up to half its flying speed with o provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary_actions.name: Minor Chord (2)
legendary_actions.desc: Each creature within 10 ft. of the symphony must make DC 18 Con save or take 9 (2d8) thunder.
